Myrick family, S. P. M. (2021). GitHub (2008) screenshot and documentation articles image and article data for machine learning, stock imagery, education and knowledge. This is a collection of images of GitHub from my time on the site in 2020 and 2021. It contains progress screenshots, error messages and logs, images of the sites changes throughout time, end of day screenshots, statistic screenshots, and more. It is a very large project, and can be used for free. For images from 2022, see the 2022 volume of this project at https://github.com/seanpm2001/SeansLifeArchive_Images_GitHub_Y2022 [Data set]. https://doi.org/10.0000/00000
